suggestions.original: To improve the line texture in the artwork, consider incorporating more varied and intricate line work within the figures and background. Adding details such as patterns on clothing, textures on the mountains, and more defined features on the flowers and airplane can enhance visual interest. Experiment with different line weights and styles to create depth and dimension, making the overall composition more dynamic and engaging.
suggestions.current: To enhance the line texture, simplifying the design by avoiding intricate patterns and textures may create a more cohesive look. By focusing on smooth, consistent lines throughout both the figures and the background, the artwork can achieve a cleaner, more modern aesthetic. Avoiding too much variation in line weight will allow the elements to blend harmoniously without overwhelming the viewer.
suggestions.added: By focusing on smooth, consistent lines throughout both the figures and the background, the artwork can achieve a cleaner, more modern aesthetic. Avoiding too much variation in line weight will allow the elements to blend harmoniously without overwhelming the viewer.
suggestions.removed: Adding details such as patterns on clothing, textures on the mountains, and more defined features on the flowers and airplane can enhance visual interest. Experiment with different line weights and styles to create depth and dimension.

suggestions.original: The line textures work well overall, but adding more detail in the figures' clothing and facial features could make them stand out more. Introducing finer lines and patterns in the clothing would add depth and make the characters more visually appealing. Using bolder lines for the background elements can also help differentiate between the foreground and background.
suggestions.current: Rather than adding more details, simplifying the line work across the characters' clothing and facial features could create a more unified look. Using fewer, more consistent lines in both the figures and the background will allow the artwork to appear more minimalist and balanced, making it easier for viewers to focus on the main elements.
suggestions.added: Using fewer, more consistent lines in both the figures and the background will allow the artwork to appear more minimalist and balanced, making it easier for viewers to focus on the main elements.
suggestions.removed: Adding more detail in the figures' clothing and facial features could make them stand out more. Introducing finer lines and patterns in the clothing would add depth and make the characters more visually appealing.

suggestions.original: To add more energy and contrast to the artwork, consider using rough, expressive lines in the background and smoother lines for the main figures. This contrast between line textures can add movement and dynamism, making the composition feel more alive and engaging.
suggestions.current: For a more cohesive and refined look, maintain consistent line textures throughout the entire artwork. By avoiding contrasts between rough and smooth lines, the piece will have a more balanced and serene composition. Consistent textures will create a harmonious design where all elements work together fluidly, making the artwork feel polished and elegant.
suggestions.added: Consistent textures will create a harmonious design where all elements work together fluidly, making the artwork feel polished and elegant.
suggestions.removed: Using rough, expressive lines in the background and smoother lines for the main figures. This contrast between line textures can add movement and dynamism, making the composition feel more alive and engaging.
